title: How do I connect to the network?
content:
You can either use the embedded node or connect to one of the secure public nodes:
- wss://my.hc1node.com:35998
- wss://node.zenonhub.io:35998

title: How do I generate plasma?
content: You can either fuse some QSR to generate a fixed amount of plasma, or use the plasma bot to temporarily allocate some plasma to your address.
